text: Miguel Arizpe Jiménez (born 17 November 1948) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Coahuila. == See also == * 1993, Coahuila state election * List of presidents of Saltillo Municipality ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Monterrey Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Universidad Iberoamericana alumni Category:Municipal presidents in Mexico
title: Miguel Arizpe Jiménez
